DataElement.preferredName: Health Utilities Index During Past Week Subject's Feelings Status
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Response about a subject's feelings during the past week.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Health Utilities Index During Past Week Subject's Feelings
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A family of generic health profiles and preference-based systems for measuring health status, reporting health-related quality of life, and producing utility scores._At some point in a given period of time._The most recent week. May include the present day._A question about an individual's feelings.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Status of an individual's general feelings.

PermissibleValues.value: Extremely fretful, angry, irritable, anxious or depressed; to the point of needing professional help
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Extremely Fretful, Angry, Irritable, Anxious, or Depressed; Needing Professional Help

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Extremely Fretful, Angry, Irritable, Anxious, or Depressed; Needing Professional Help
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual is or was extremely fretful, angry, irritable, anxious, or depressed, to the point of needing professional help.

Concepts.longName: Extremely Fretful, Angry, Irritable, Anxious, or Depressed; Needing Professional Help
